description_text:
Hi,

I have Simsonn v1.7.1 pedals. The throttle and brake work perfectly but the
clutch pedal doesn't work. I'm plugging it in for the first time and it
doesn't register at all to assign it to the clutch function in game. I'd
love some help to figure out why it doesn't work.

Kind regards,
Vasko

conversations.body_text: Hi Vasko Kolarski,  If it is version 1.7.1, you can update the pedal firmware in Simsonn Manager 2.1.2 via Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → Pedals → firmware → pedals-plus.sfu.      https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
